questions.whatIsParkSafeAnswer: ParkSafe is a mobile application that helps you find secure bike and scooter parking spots. With map display, real-time information, and community ratings, we support finding safe storage.
questions.howSearchWorks: How does the parking search work?
questions.howSearchWorksAnswer: The app uses GPS-based location to show parking spots in your area. You can filter by type (bike/scooter), distance, and view safety ratings for each location.
questions.isFreeAnswer: Basic features are free to use. Premium services cost 990 HUF per month, which you can try free for the first month. Premium features can be cancelled anytime.
questions.premiumFeatures: What premium features do you offer?
questions.premiumFeaturesAnswer: Premium subscription includes detailed security information, camera system data, special filters, notifications, and offline maps.
questions.addLocation: How can I add a new parking spot?
questions.addLocationAnswer: By long-pressing on the map, you can add a new parking spot. Provide the necessary information (type, security, description) and it will become available to the community after approval.
questions.reportError: What to do if I find incorrect information?
questions.reportErrorAnswer: Every parking spot has a "Report" button where you can report incorrect or outdated information. Reports are processed within 24 hours.
questions.rateLocation: How can I rate parking spots?
questions.rateLocationAnswer: In the detailed view of a parking spot, you can give a 1-5 star rating and write a text review. Ratings help other users make decisions.
questions.locationPermission: Why is it important to enable location?
questions.locationPermissionAnswer: Location is needed to show you parking spots in your area. We only use data for providing the service.
questions.offlineModeAnswer: Basic features are available offline with premium subscription. Previously viewed area maps and parking spot information are available offline.
questions.dataProtection: How do you protect my data?
questions.dataProtectionAnswer: All data is stored in encrypted form. Location data is only used for providing the service. Detailed information can be found in the Privacy Policy.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Premiumtex Kft. (headquarters: 6792 ZsombÃ³, DÃ³zsa dÅ±lÅ‘ 55.; company registration number: 06-09-013323; tax number: 14559253-2-06) is committed to protecting users' personal data. This privacy policy details how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when using the ParkSafe application.
introduction.paragraph2: By using the application, you accept the terms contained in this privacy policy and consent to the processing of your data as described herein.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection
dataCollection.intro: To provide our services, we collect the following data:

items.registration: Registration data: name, email address, phone number
items.location: Location data: GPS coordinates, search locations
items.device: Device information: device type, operating system, application version
items.usage: Usage data: application usage statistics, preferences
items.community: Community content: ratings, reviews, uploaded images

dataUsage.title: 3. Data Usage
dataUsage.intro: We use the collected data for the following purposes:

items.service: Service provision: displaying storage locations, navigation

locationData.title: 4. Location Data Handling
locationData.intro: Location data handling requires special attention:

items.permission: We only collect location data with explicit permission
items.processing: Precise location is only processed during service use
items.history: We do not store location history long-term
items.sharing: You can disable location data sharing at any time
items.offline: During offline use, location data remains local

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.intro: To protect data, we implement the following security measures:

items.encryption: Encryption: all data is stored encrypted
items.access: Access restriction: only authorized personnel have access
items.backup: Data loss protection: regular security backups

dataSharing.title: 6. Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not share personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:

items.legal: Legal obligation: in case of official requests

items.public: Ratings and reviews are publicly visible
items.deletion: You can delete your own content at any time

cookiesTracking.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
cookiesTracking.intro: We use technical data necessary for application operation:

items.errors: Error reporting: identifying and fixing bugs

userRights.title: 9. User Rights
userRights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.access: Access: viewing and retrieving your data
items.portability: Portability: transferring data to other providers

dataRetention.title: 10. Data Retention
dataRetention.intro: We retain data for the following periods:

items.transactions: Transaction data: as per legal obligation (5 years)
items.location: Location data: automatically deleted after 30 days

contact.title: 12. Contact and Reports
contact.intro: For privacy questions, requests, and complaints, contact us:

items.notification: We notify in advance of significant changes
items.display: Modifications also appear in the application
items.effective: Changes take effect within 30 days of announcement

generalProvisions.title: 1. General Provisions
generalProvisions.paragraph1: These General Terms and Conditions (hereinafter: Terms) apply to the use of the ParkSafe application and services operated by Premiumtex Kft. (headquarters: 6792 ZsombÃ³, DÃ³zsa dÅ±lÅ‘ 55.; company registration number: 06-09-013323; tax number: 14559253-2-06).
generalProvisions.paragraph2: By using the application, you accept the terms contained in these Terms. Please read the following terms carefully before registration.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.intro: ParkSafe is a mobile application and web platform that helps users find secure bicycle and scooter storage locations. Within the service, we provide the following functions:

items.securityInfo: Security information and camera system data

registrationAccount.title: 3. Registration and User Account
registrationAccount.intro: Registration is required for full use of the service. The user is responsible for the authenticity of the data provided during registration. The user is obligated to:

feesPayment.title: 4. Fees and Payment
feesPayment.intro: The basic functions of the application can be used free of charge. We charge a monthly fee of 990 HUF for premium services. Payment is made with automatic renewal, which the user can cancel at any time.
feesPayment.freeTrialInfo: Premium services can be tried free for the first month. If cancellation is missed, the premium subscription will automatically renew.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.paragraph1: The application and its content (software, graphics, texts, database) are the intellectual property of Premiumtex Kft. The user is only entitled to use the service for its intended purpose.
intellectualProperty.paragraph2: It is prohibited to copy, distribute, modify or commercially use the application content without the written permission of Premiumtex Kft.

limitationLiability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.paragraph1: Premiumtex Kft. does not assume responsibility for the actual security or availability of storage locations. The information displayed in the application is for informational purposes.
limitationLiability.paragraph2: The company is not liable for damages, thefts or any other losses suffered by the user at storage locations.

communityContent.title: 7. Community Content
communityContent.paragraph1: The user is responsible for the copyright of ratings, reviews and other content posted by users. The company reserves the right to remove inappropriate content.
communityContent.paragraph2: It is prohibited to post profane, offensive, illegal or false content. The account of the poster of such content will be suspended.

serviceSuspension.title: 8. Service Suspension
serviceSuspension.paragraph1: Premiumtex Kft. reserves the right to temporarily or permanently suspend the service due to maintenance, development or other technical reasons.
serviceSuspension.paragraph2: In case of serious breach of contract, the company is entitled to immediately suspend or delete the user account without prior notice.

disputeResolution.title: 9. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.paragraph1: Hungarian law applies to the resolution of legal disputes related to these Terms. The parties primarily attempt to resolve disputes peacefully.
disputeResolution.paragraph2: If peaceful resolution does not lead to results, the Budapest Court has exclusive jurisdiction to adjudicate legal disputes.

termsModification.title: 10. Terms Modification
termsModification.paragraph1: Premiumtex Kft. reserves the right to unilaterally modify these Terms. We inform users about modifications via email or notification appearing in the application.
termsModification.paragraph2: Modifications take effect within 15 days of announcement. By continuing to use the service, the user accepts the modified terms.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.intro: For questions and complaints related to these Terms, you can contact us at the following contacts:
